PS01.name: Mobile Application for Clinic Appointment Management
PS01.description: Develop a mobile application to improve productivity, enhance patient experience and enable data analytics by streamlining appointment scheduling, patient flow, and communication at a clinic.

PS02.name: Mobile Application for Clinic Fee Collection
PS02.description: Develop a mobile application to manage fees collection at a clinic, efficiently collect payments and issue receipts in addition to facilitating data analytics.

PS03.name: Mobile Password Manager with Advanced Login Monitoring
PS03.description: Develop a mobile password manager application that securely stores user credentials for multiple websites/applications, auto-fills them when needed, and tracks login time and location for security monitoring.

PS04.name: External Hardware Device Detection
PS04.description: Develop a system that automatically detects and displays connected external devices like Wi-Fi adapters, Bluetooth devices, USB drives, monitors and printers along with their device name and details.

PS05.name: Voice to Text Conversion
PS05.description: Develop a system capable of recording voice conversations and converting them into text in real time, accurately transcribing speech and distinguishing between different speakers without using specified libraries.

PS06.name: Image to Text Conversion and Medical Data Generation
PS06.description: Create a system that extracts text from images such as medical reports, prescriptions, or handwritten notes, and converts them into structured digital format for easier storage, retrieval, and processing.

PS07.name: Database Encryption
PS07.description: Implement encryption for health-related data in databases, including patient name, medical history, and diagnosis, to ensure privacy and prevent unauthorized access while allowing authorized users to see decrypted data.

PS08.name: Hospital Memo Issuing & Tracking System
PS08.description: Build a web-based role-driven application that enables hospital staff to raise non-medical memos, route them to the right departments, allow responders to act, tag others, or escalate when required.

PS09.name: Residential Visitor and Parking Token Management System
PS09.description: Develop a digital, role-driven system that enables residents to pre-register visitors and vehicles, security staff to validate entries and issue parking tokens, and admins to configure access and analyze visit trends.

PS10.name: B2B Jewelry Catalog Mobile Application
PS10.description: Develop a Flutter-based cross-platform mobile application for jewelry manufacturers to showcase their product catalog to B2B customers (wholesalers), with features for product listing, search and filtering, detailed product views, and user actions like favoriting items and sending enquiries.

PS11.name: Jewelry Comparison Feature in B2B Mobile Application
PS11.description: Implement a feature that allows users to select multiple jewelry items and compare them side by side, displaying relevant attributes like product image, gold karatage, diamond/gemstone weight, total price, and labor cost to help users make informed decisions.
